title: Bobby’s Girlfriend Made Him Shave The Beard + Eddie Son Learns Guitar + Name That Instrument
itunes:title: Bobby’s Girlfriend Made Him Shave The Beard + Eddie Son Learns Guitar + Name That Instrument
description:
Bobby gives an update on how things are going with him and his girlfriend Caitlin now that they’ve been together over 4 weeks in quarantine. He tells us why she made him shave his beard. Eddie’s son Eddie Jr. just learned his first song on guitar. He gives us a ‘virtual concert’. Plus, we play ‘Name That Instrument’. Bobby plays some random instruments he has lying around the house and the show has to guess what he's playing!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
